title: Netflix Stock Is Soaring After Its Earnings Easily Beat Expectations. What You Need to Know.
text:
Netflix stock (ticker: NFLX) jumped in after-hours trading Wednesday after the streaming video company posted third-quarter earnings that were well ahead of previous guidance, while subscriber growth came in just shy of projections.

For the September quarter, Netflix posted revenue of $5.244 billion, just a hair below the company’s projection of $5.25 billion. Diluted earnings were $1.47 a share, dramatically ahead of guidance at $1.04 a share. The company’s operating margin came in at 18.7%, well ahead of the projected 14.3%....
description: Netflix stock rose in after-hours trading Wednesday after the streaming video company posted third-quarter earnings that were well ahead of previous guidance, while subscriber growth came in just shy of projections.
